text:
i never realized how much amazing music is in all of these games and i own quite a few of the ones in your playlist. i've always listened to them and subconsciously thought ok thats good, but when you put them out like this to listen to, it makes me focus more on the music than the game play and it makes me really think wow. THIS is really good.
:)

text: finally we here something from machinarium!!! really awesome choice. if you have time I encourage you to listen to Mecholup by Floex(Tomas Dvorak). I'm still waiting for you to play world of goo that has some amazing music as well...
author: Padraic Rapp

text:
I felt like you had more of this awesome soundtrack. I saw the pic and thought "Another one from that game? Must love it a lot."
Then I hit more info and saw this was only the third.
It really makes me realize it's an honor for any game to even make this list, let alone with multiple entries is nothing short of an amazing feat.
If I ever produce a game(hope to someday with an elaborate idea I have, worked on for ages), I will most certainly lend to you said soundtrack first.

text: Dvorak really hit a homerun with this unique soundtrack. This is another great ambient piece, I remember spending extra time in the glasshouse because of the music and how you only had to spend a short time there before moving on.
